title: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Press Release / Media Release 31 May - Kotak Mahindra Bank announces Deputy MD retirement and appoints Paritosh Kashyap as Executive Director.
date: 31 May - Kotak Mahindra Bank announces Deputy MD retirement and appoints Paritosh Kashyap as Executive Director.

title: Appointment Of Secretarial Auditor 31 May - Kotak Mahindra Bank appoints Parikh & Associates as secretarial auditor for FY 2025-26 to 2029-30.
date: 31 May - Kotak Mahindra Bank appoints Parikh & Associates as secretarial auditor for FY 2025-26 to 2029-30.

title: Intimation Under Regulation 30 Of The SEBI (LODR) Regulations, 2015 - Change In Director / Key Managerial Personnel / Changes In Senior Management Personnel 31 May - Kotak Mahindra Bank announces retirement of DMD, appoints new Whole-time Director and key compliance officers.
date: 31 May - Kotak Mahindra Bank announces retirement of DMD, appoints new Whole-time Director and key compliance officers.

title: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Change in Directorate 31 May - Kotak Bank announces retirement of DMD, appoints new Whole-time Director, CCO, and Head of Internal Audit.
date: 31 May - Kotak Bank announces retirement of DMD, appoints new Whole-time Director, CCO, and Head of Internal Audit.

title: Compliances-Reg.24(A)-Annual Secretarial Compliance 30 May - Kotak Mahindra Bank's FY25 Annual Secretarial Compliance Report with minor non-material regulatory deviations.
date: 30 May - Kotak Mahindra Bank's FY25 Annual Secretarial Compliance Report with minor non-material regulatory deviations.
